location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Political Resident at Bushire to the President and Members of the General Late Council, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has partially obscured the signature of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter is providing an assessment of the company's performance in the sale of wool at Bushire over the last three decades. It notes reasons for underperformance and makes recommendations to improve sales in the future. It also claims that there is a market for a range of metals at Bushire.
